name: Doggo The Spaceman
description:
Doggo spaceman-Our nokia game jam submission

W or SPACE - Jump(Two presses doublejump)

A - Left

D - Right

Jump throught space full of stones avoid touching bottom or sides of map and have best score :)

Be carefull stones every 30 seconds is faster and faster.
(ps.When you get stuck at side of stone try jumping it will help you out)

When you want share your score to us in comments :)

#nokiajam
